features: Expand your bike's carrying capacity and functionality with B-Rad (Bottle Relocation and Accessory Device)
B-Rad base mounts shift the position of the cage mounts and add new ones
2 slots mount: Ideal to shift bottle position for easier access, especially on smaller frames
3 and 4 slots mounts: Allows simultaneous use of multiple B-Rad accessories or bottle cages
All base mounts are compatible with all B-Rad accessory
3 and 4 slots also include foam pad, zip ties & zip tie channels for more secure fastening
To verify frame compatibility, please refer to the "Documents and links" tab.
